CatDescriptText: image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 9, 1960, pg. A9, reads: "Alberta Thompson was stunning in this Ricci daytime dress in beige, with the new bat-wing sleeve and skirt full at the hips."Image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 19, 1960, pg. A12, reads: "Alberta Thompson will be one of the chic models for the Nov. 18 fashion show which will be held at A. Leo Weil School auditorium, with the Young Women's Ushers Board of Wesley Center AME Zion Church as sponsor."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Alberta Thompson wearing light colored button down dress with belt, and bulky bodice with large tie at neckline, and dark hat with feather, standing in interior of the New Arena Supper Club for the D.I.'s National Foundation benefit
